mapper.select: SELECT FILE_SEQ as 'seq', PROJ_SEQ as 'boardSeq', FILE_FILENM as 'filename', FILE_PATHNM as 'pathname', FILE_SIZE as 'size' FROM TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT_FILE WHERE PROJ_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT_FILE (PROJ_SEQ, FILE_PATHNM, FILE_FILENM, FILE_SIZE) VALUES (#{boardSeq}, #{pathname}, #{filename}, #{size})
